product_name: Adventure Medical Kits GlacierGel Blister and Burn Dressings
long_description: Get instant relief from small blisters and burns encountered on the trail with this handy kit from Adventure Medical. Includes three small 1.25 x 1 in. and three large 3 x 1.75 in. GlacierGel(TM) pads to relieve pain and protect wounds from further irritation. Also includes six alcohol prep pads for cleansing wounds prior to applying GlacierGel pads.
short_description: Get instant relief from small blisters and burns encountered on the trail with this handy kit from Adventure Medical.
